name: A&A Communications
tagline: Your Source for Remote Live Receptionists.
description:
A&A Communications, located in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area, is a telephone answering service with live receptionists. We have been in business since 1979 and have clients from many different professions. Our purpose and responsibility is to answer your calls pleasantly in a professional fashion and to deliver accurate information to you in a timely manner.
Since we represent your company and we want your callers to have a positive experience on the phone, we make an effort to know your business or organization and to make sure your customers are served in a friendly way.
